query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Technology Round-up and Market Readiness Report – final
result.description: The Technology Round-up is an eMagazine designed for cross-unit fertilisation. It is thematically structured and features articles and success stories (e.g. technology breakthroughs, new services/solutions/deployments), and snapshots on new projects. It has two issues. The eMagazine is circulated 1-month after Concertation meetings as a round-up of key outcomes with coverage of the prize winners. The related Market Readiness Report provides a concise analysis of concluded project outputs and their sustainability and an outlook on running projects, expected times to market, sustainability strategies and business models. As content of this deliverble is dependant on the timing of Concertation meeting, the delivery date may change. The document will be delivered at the end of the month after the Concertation meeting.

result.title: Roadmap and strategy technical report for achieving agricultural and water resources sustainability in Malta
result.description: A document will be produced outlining the roadmap and strategy that should be followed to achieve agriculture and water resources sustainability in Malta. This will be done at the last few months of the project after all information, research results, discussions and evaluations have been undertaken.
